title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 64 - Movement And Transfer Of Horses And Other Equidae
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 64 - Movement And Transfer Of Horses And Other Equidae

State Regulations
§ 64.1 - General requirements
§ 64.2 - Form of certificate, permit or equivalent
§ 64.3 - Time limitation of certificate
§ 64.4 - Test requirements for importation
§ 64.5 - Importation for immediate slaughter
§ 64.6 - Importation from certain areas
§ 64.7 - Test requirements for transport
§ 64.8 - Test requirements for sale or other change of ownership
§ 64.9 - Other authorized movement or transfer
§ 64.10 - Transportation of horses
§ 64.11 - Importation of thoroughbred stallions for breeding; test for equine viral arteritis required
§ 64.12 - New york equine interstate passport

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 64

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§3, 16, 18, 72, 74, 90-a, 95-c

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
